DOC.brief_summary: This Phase IIIb , multicenter , randomize , placebo-controlled trial evaluate safety efficacy chemotherapy+bevacizumab follow bevacizumab+erlotinib versus bevacizumab+erlotinib placebo subject locally advanced metastatic NSCLC .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Bevacizumab Therapy With Without Erlotinib First-Line Treatment Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer ( ATLAS )
